info.title: The Lord of the Rings
info.description: This is the one API to rule them all. No really, it serves your needs regarding data about The Lord of the Rings, the epic books by J. R. R. Tolkien and the official movie adaptions by Peter Jackson.

get.description: The list of all "The Lord of the Rings" books.
Request all chapters of one specific book.

boxOfficeRevenueInMillions.description: The box office revenue in millions.
boxOfficeRevenueInMillions.title: Box Office Revenue In Millions

academyAwardNominations.description: The number of Academy Award nominations.
academyAwardNominations.title: Academy Award Nominations

academyAwardWins.description: The number of Academy Award wins..
academyAwardWins.title: Academy Award Wins

get.description: List of all movies, including the "The Lord of the Rings" and the "The Hobbit" trilogies.

get.description: Request all movie quotes for one specific movie (only working for the LotR trilogy).
